name: Apocalyptic Romance
description:
OH NO! IT'S THE APOCALYPSE! UNFORTUNATELY, PEOPLE ARE STILL CREEPS WHO WANT TO DATE YOU!

RUN FROM UNWANTED ADVANCES TO SAVE YOURSELF FROM A BAD DATE, WHILST ALSO HELPING PEOPLE ON YOUR WAY.

BECAUSE IF YOU DONT HELP PEOPLE, AND ONLY THINK ABOUT YOURSELF, YOUR GUILT METER WILL GO UP, CAUSING YOU TO SLOW DOWN BECAUSE OF MENTAL ANGUISH, MAKING YOU VULNERABLE TO THE CREEP!

AND THEN... A BAD DATE WITH LOTS OF AWKARD SILENCES ENSUES... DID WE MENTION IT WAS ALSO THE APOCALYPSE??!!!!!!

--------------How to play-------------

Move left-right: arrow keys / A-D 

Your guilt is indicated at the top right: keep it at bay with items that have negative "G(uilt)" scores 

The creep's distance to you is indicated at the top left: keep him at bay with items that have negative "M(eter)" scores 

ITEMS

Stay away from the creep following you by collecting items that make you faster or the creep slower: 

- Grab faster shoes 

- Throw a banana behind you

- ..

Keep your guilt a bay by doing good deeds: 

- Helping an older person cross the street 

- Help a child  that has dropped ice cream 

- ...
